SQL.LOAD: SELECT depreciation_schedule_id, low_month, high_month, percent, amount, created_date, modified_date, created_by, modified_by, depreciation_schedule_item_id FROM elp_depreciation_scd_details WHERE depreciation_schedule_item_id = :depreciation_schedule_item_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT depreciation_schedule_item_id, depreciation_schedule_id, low_month, high_month, percent, amount, created_date, modified_date, created_by, modified_by FROM elp_depreciation_scd_details WHERE depreciation_schedule_id = :depreciation_schedule_id ORDER BY low_month, high_month
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_depreciation_scd_details SET depreciation_schedule_id = :depreciation_schedule_id, low_month = :low_month, high_month = :high_month, percent = :percent, amount = :amount, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE depreciation_schedule_item_id = :depreciation_schedule_item_id
